channel.title: Problem with running silab client. Help much appreciated!
channel.description:
First of all, if this is in hte wrong section, please tell me so i can move it. Do not flam/spam my thread saying "what a noob!!! wr0ng thr34d n33b!" or anything stupid like that (lol).
my problem is this:
i downloaded silabs new client (w00t silab u rock) and when i try to run it, this comes up:
[code] C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client. jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents>pause Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
so please help me, i really would like to play using the new client :)
thanks everyone, links to tutorials would be helpful also.
--lil--

item.title: Problem with running silab client. Help much appreciated!
item.dc:creator: @dantotman dantotman
item.description:
@dantotman wrote:

Try redownloading, getting jdk reconised. Then try. Worked for me…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with running silab client. Help much appreciated!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

K first,extract,second download jdk 6u2 from http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp,then try and run.bat,tell me what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with running silab client. Help much appreciated!
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Shiniy He has all ready extracted it what would winrar do.

does your run.bat look like this?

JAVA  -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause

If it does have you downloaded that latest version of Java?

Read full topic

hmm u have winrar?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2007, 09:57:16 PM[/size][hr]if u dotn ahve winrar u will need to downloead wen u do extrac files and then u run.bat if it does not work u will need to downloead jdk and put all variables

First of all, if this is in hte wrong section, please tell me so i can move it. Do not flam/spam my thread saying “what a noob!!! wr0ng thr34d n33b!” or anything stupid like that (lol).

my problem is this:

i downloaded silabs new client (w00t silab u rock) and when i try to run it, this comes up:

[code]
C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.
jar 0 0 highmem members 0

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

so please help me, i really would like to play using the new client
